title: Plastic solar LED road stud
describe:
## Solar LED Road Stud Reflectors in Plastic 
Item No.: LD-RSD-SP



## Key Feature: 

PC material with Polycarbonate epoxy filler

Smooth shape without sharp corner

solid body withstands higher compression

## Spot lighting:

Polycarbonate epoxy filler

Dia 116mm
H 25mm

0.292kg

Red blue green yellow white

IP 68

### YouTube Link：

[baidu](https://baidu.com)
detail:
## Specifications

|Item|Value|
|:---------| :-----| 
|Size	 |φ116x25mm|
|Net Weight	 |0.292kg|
|Material	 |PC shell with epoxy filler|
|LED	 |φ5mm, one-way 3pcs, two-way 6pcs|
|Light	 |steady, or flash (2HZ or upon request)|
|Luminous intensity	 |5000mcd|
|View distance	 |over 1000m|
|Color	 |white, yellow, red, blue, green|
|Solar Panel	| Monocrystalline silicon 5V 60MA|
|Battery	 |Anti-heat Li battery 3.2V 500MAH|
|Battery Life span	 |2000Cycle/365day More than 5 Years|
|Full charge time   |3 hours @100 Klux(sunny day)|
|Working time	 |72 hours after full charge|
|Activation	 |photo sensor|
|Starting intensity	 |500Lux|
|Compression resistance	 |over 10 tons|
|Working temperature	 |-20℃~+80℃|
|Water ingress rating	| IP68|
|Warranty	 |One year|

## Application

As solar LED road stud was powered by sunshine ,and the PC material is more lightweight,so it can be used on the Christmas trees for decoration,which is popular used in Netherlands,England and Australian .

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15622519/42759310-2091ae0c-8939-11e8-841f-8cc7e0895f21.jpg)![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15622519/42759308-2060c526-8939-11e8-910e-aac83bdd9929.jpg)![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15622519/42759307-202ce8aa-8939-11e8-8f86-b461945701c3.jpg)

title: Aluminum solar LED road stud with foot
describe:
## Aluminum solar LED road stud with foot
Item No.:LD-RSD-AL-B

## Key Feature: 
Flexible solar panel, 20ton compression resistance. Larger solar panel area, charging efficiency is increased by 30%. Electronic components sealed in the shank, anti-impact design. Anti-impact and IP68 design for reflector.

title: Speed Bumps
describe:
## Speed Bumps
Item No.: LD-SB-006



## Key Feature: 

EU standard .
Characteristics:
1. Rubber Speed Hump can lower vehicle's speed when the car pass by. 
2. In the daytime, its warning color which is yellow and black is eye-catching.
3. The hump is installed with a light reflection that can reflect the brightlight
in the evening, which can attract drivers' attention and to enhance thesecurity.

describe:

Item No.:LD-GS09

## Key Feature: 
•  The products was made of Alkaline Soil Aluminate .
•  Work through light absorption - light saving - self-luminous
•  No radioactive ,Chemical stability ,safety and environmental protection
